titleStmt.title: The genuine remains of that learned prelate Dr. Thomas Barlow, late Lord Bishop of Lincoln containing divers discourses theological, philosophical, historical, &c., in letters to several persons of honour and quality : to which is added the resolution of many abstruse points published from Dr. Barlow's original papers.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
